items.scopeNote: Extracts input features that overlay the clip features.
items.label: Clip

items.scopeNote: Raster map calculator.
items.label: r.mapcalc

items.scopeNote: Creates a table with statistics based on polygon contiguity (overlaps, coincident edges, or nodes).
items.label: Polygon_neighbors

items.scopeNote: Calculates univariate statistics on selected table column.
items.label: db.univar

items.scopeNote: Creates buffer polygons around input features to a specified distance.
items.label: Buffer

items.scopeNote: Calculates the least accumulative cost distance for each cell to the nearest source over a cost surface.
items.label: Cost_distance

items.scopeNote: Simulates TOPMODEL which is a physically based hydrologic model.
items.label: r.topmodel

items.editorialNote: Misses geometry, buffer, and line keywords.
items.scopeNote: Creates parallel line to input vector lines.
items.label: v.parallel

items.editorialNote: Misses buffer, area, circle, geometry, and line keywords.
items.scopeNote: Creates a buffer around vector features of given type.
items.label: v.buffer

items.scopeNote: Numerical calculation program for transient, confined and unconfined groundwater flow in two dimensions.
items.label: r.gwflow

items.creator: Johannes Brauner
items.label: geooperators
items.title: Geooperator thesaurus
items.description: SKOS representation of a geooperator thesaurus started during the PhD thesis ("Formalizations for geooperators - geoprocessing in Spatial Data Infrastructures") of Johannes Brauner.

items.scopeNote: Calculates distance and additional proximity information between the input features and the closest feature in another layer or feature class.
items.label: Near

items.scopeNote: Calculates distance and additional proximity information between the input features and the closest feature in another layer or feature class.
items.label: Generate_near_table

items.scopeNote: Reclassifies (or changes) the values in a raster.
items.label: Reclassify_-_spatial_analyst_toolbox

items.editorialNote: Requires raster3D, groundwater flow, and voxel keywords.
items.scopeNote: Numerical calculation program for transient, confined groundwater flow in three dimensions.
items.label: r3.gwflow

items.definition: Tomlin, C. D. (1990). Geographic information systems and cartographic modeling. Englewood Cliffs, New Jersey: Prentice-Hall.
items.scopeNote: Abstract geooperator implementing the Map Algebra LocalDifference function.
items.label: LocalDifference

items.scopeNote: Projects spatial data from one coordinate system to another.
items.label: Project_-_data_management_toolbox

items.scopeNote: Joins attributes from one feature to another based on the spatial relationship. The target features and the joined attributes from the join features are written to the output feature class.
items.label: Spatial_join

items.scopeNote: Converts a raster dataset to polyline features.
items.label: Raster_to_polyline

items.scopeNote: Converts features to a raster dataset.
items.label: Feature_to_raster

items.editorialNote: Misses distance, database, and attribute table keywords.
items.scopeNote: Finds the nearest element in vector map 'to' for elements in vector map 'from'.
items.label: v.distance

items.scopeNote: Calculates summary statistics for field(s) in a table.
items.label: Summary_statistics

items.scopeNote: Flow computation for massive grids (float version).
items.label: r.terraflow

items.scopeNote: Calculates the least-cost path from a source to a destination.
items.label: Cost_path

items.scopeNote: Overlays two vector maps.
items.label: v.overlay

items.editorialNote: This is a deprecated tool. This functionality has been replaced by Near and Generate Near Table tools that now calculate distances between point, polyline and polygon features.
items.scopeNote: Determines the distances from input point features to all points in the near features within a specified search radius.
items.label: Point_distance

items.scopeNote: Creates a topographic index raster map from an elevation raster map.
items.label: r.topidx

items.scopeNote: Creates Thiessen polygons from point features. Each Thiessen polygon contains only a single point input feature. Any location within a Thiessen polygon is closer to its associated point than to any other point input feature.
items.label: Create_Thiessen_polygons

items.editorialNote: Requires soil, flow, and overland flow keywords.
items.scopeNote: Overland flow hydrologic simulation using path sampling method (SIMWE).
items.label: r.sim.water

items.scopeNote: Creates a Voronoi diagram in current region from an input vector map containing points or centroids.
items.label: v.voronoi

items.scopeNote: Creates multiple buffers at specified distances around the input features. These buffers can optionally be merged and dissolved using the buffer distance values to create non-overlapping buffers.
items.label: Multiple_ring_buffer

items.scopeNote: Creates a feature class by overlaying the Input Features with the polygons of the Erase Features. Only those portions of the input features falling outside the erase features outside boundaries are copied to the output feature class.
items.label: Erase

items.scopeNote: Extracts features from an input feature class or input feature layer, typically using a select or Structured Query Language (SQL) expression and stores them in an output feature class.
items.label: Select

items.scopeNote: Selects vector features from an existing vector map and creates a new vector map containing only the selected features.
items.label: v.extract

items.scopeNote: Computes the intersection between two feature classes and cross-tabulates the area, length, or count of the intersecting features.
items.label: Tabulate_intersection

items.scopeNote: Computes a geometric intersection of the input features. Features or portions of features which overlap in all layers and/or feature classes will be written to the output feature class.
items.label: Intersect

items.scopeNote: Computes a geometric union of the input features. All features and their attributes will be written to the output feature class.
items.label: Union

items.editorialNote: Misses geometry, and spatial query keywords.
items.scopeNote: Selects features from vector map (A) by features from other vector map (B).
items.label: v.select

items.scopeNote: Reads a table and a set of fields and creates a new table containing unique field values and the number of occurrences of each unique field value.
items.label: Frequency

items.scopeNote: Builds and executes a single Map Algebra expression using Python syntax in a calculator-like interface.
items.label: Raster_calculator

items.scopeNote: Features or portions of features in the input and update features that do not overlap will be written to the output feature class.
items.label: Symmetrical_difference
